transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road, taking lots of people to different places. What am I?

hints.text: 👪 I can carry many friends and family
🛑 I stop at bus stops
🚏 You wait for me at a special sign

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird
✈️ I have wings but I'm not an angel
💺 You sit in a seat inside me

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many passengers. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
📣 I make a loud 'choo choo' sound.
📍 I stop at stations.

transport.question: I float on the water and can take you to faraway lands across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a boat
⚓ I use an anchor to stay still
🚢 People travel on me for fun or to visit new places.

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ You should always wear a helmet when using me.
🚴 I am a fun way to exercise.
🔔 I sometimes have a bell to ring.

transport.question: I have a motor and two wheels, but I'm not a bicycle. I can go very fast. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍✈️ People who ride me often wear helmets and leather.
💨 I make a loud rumbling sound.
🛣️ I am faster than a bicycle.

transport.question: I travel under the sea, and people can look out of me to see the ocean life. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am not a boat.
🤿 I go deeper than a diver.
👀 You can see sharks and fish from inside me.

transport.question: I have a basket in the front, two wheels, and you can pedal me slowly around town. What am I?

hints.text: 🧺 I am great for short trips to the market.
🌷 I'm often used in places like Holland
🚲 I'm a type of bicycle built for comfort.

transport.question: I zoom into space carrying astronauts to the moon and beyond. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast!
👩‍🚀 You need special training to ride me.
🌌 I leave the Earth's atmosphere.

transport.question: I am a type of small helicopter, often used for personal transport or by the police. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I am smaller than a large airplane.
🚨 You may see me flying over a city.
🚖 I can land on buildings in cities.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. I have leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sunshine
🍃 Bugs like to eat me!
🏡 You might see me in a garden

plant.question: I have a trunk and branches, and I am very tall. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 Birds like to build nests in me
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall
🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day

plant.question: I am round and red, and I grow on a tree. People like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: ❤️ Snow White ate me.
🍎 You can make juice out of me
🔴 I am a fruit

plant.question: I am a long orange vegetable. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange
🥬 You can eat me raw or cooked
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!

plant.question: I am yellow and grow in a field. You can eat me off the cob. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I am a grain
🌽 I grow on a stalk
🍿 You can pop me in the microwave!

plant.question: I have a stem, petals, and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in gardens.
🐝 I help make honey
💐 People give me as a gift

plant.question: I am a plant that climbs. I produce sweet purple, green, or red treats. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 You can make juice from me.
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow!

plant.question: I am a large plant that grows on the ground, I am orange outside with many black seeds inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am used for jack-o'-lanterns
🥧 My insides are used to make pies.
🍂 You see me around Halloween

plant.question: I am a plant that is usually green, but can be different colors. I am often used in salads and am very healthy. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am leafy
🥗 You can put dressing on me!
💪 Popeye likes to eat my cousin

plant.question: I am a plant that grows underground. I have eyes, but I can't see. You can bake, fry, or mash me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I am a tuber
🍟 You can make french fries from me
🌍 I am grown all over the world!
